Reviews.Title: Phone is invalid
Reviews.Author: adil
Reviews.Content: I note your phone unusable frequent breakdowns and is clean and the battery door does not close the well is not fit for use

Reviews.Title: Its a bad cell
Reviews.Author: Texas Ranger
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my mom and she was quite happy with it and it worked just perfect but it seemed as if it was a used phone.Okey because it worked fine anyway. But then it started to work bad, some buttons need to be pressed very hard to work . It's a bad buy.

Reviews.Title: I bought it after my old one broke
Reviews.Author: Abduh Alharbi
Reviews.Content: I have had a Nokia N95 8GB before, and I loved it so much. It has broke, but I bought an identical one again. It might seem a little crazy, but that how I love the phone. It has no touch screen, or modern games, but still it is one of the best, if not the best, classic cellphones.

Reviews.Title: Need an answer
Reviews.Author: Nada
Reviews.Content: I have used Nokia N95 8GB before but this one is different.It is not in the quality which I  know. The battery cover is moving and losing sometimes and the handle of this cover is made of plastic not as before ( metal ) beside the phone body is easy to  scratch.The payment I made show that the phone is genuine but this is not what I have found when I used it less than 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: it used be a good
Reviews.Author: Abdulla Alaqil
Reviews.Content: the nokia used to be one of the best mobile devices, now with the iphone and samsung, there no way u could use the stupid deivcei bought for 10 days and i sold immeditly .. its stupid mobile ..and i will not buy it again even if its made in finland

Reviews.Content: i saw this product made on Fenland  but i found it made in Chana. he/ she did not write all the information about his product.
